doc.title: Droga
doc.plot: The film is based on the confession of an 18-year-old drug-addict and the diary of a girl - a reformed drug-addict. The documentary shots made in the paramedic's ambulance, in the emergency room, the reanimation ward and the mortuary of the Hospital "Pirogov" in Sofia add to the feeling of doomedness which awaits all who reach the for dope.
